fields.name: Actions
fields.description: the array of actions that are performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.

fields.name: AutoMitigate
fields.description: the flag that indicates whether the alert should be auto resolved or not. The default is true.

fields.name: Criteria
fields.description: defines the specific alert criteria information.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: the description of the metric alert that will be included in the alert email.

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: the flag that indicates whether the metric alert is enabled.

fields.name: EvaluationFrequency
fields.description: how often the metric alert is evaluated represented in ISO 8601 duration format.

fields.name: IsMigrated
fields.description: the value indicating whether this alert rule is migrated.

fields.name: LastUpdatedTime
fields.description: Last time the rule was updated in ISO8601 format.

fields.name: Scopes
fields.description: the list of resource id's that this metric alert is scoped to.

fields.name: TargetResourceRegion
fields.description: the region of the target resource(s) on which the alert is created/updated. Mandatory if the scope contains a subscription, resource group, or more than one resource.

fields.name: TargetResourceType
fields.description: the resource type of the target resource(s) on which the alert is created/updated. Mandatory if the scope contains a subscription, resource group, or more than one resource.

fields.name: WindowSize
fields.description: the period of time (in ISO 8601 duration format) that is used to monitor alert activity based on the threshold.
